lender.name: Daisy
lender.loan_because: I have a great opportunity to open up a restaurant with existing foot traffic & little overhead. I have paid out out of pocket for 80% of all start up fees, & after construction work & other unexpected Fees paid for necessary ventilation & fire suppressant system to get approved by DHEC, I am now lacking some of the needed funding needed to purchase necessary equipment to open. My 1st lease payment will be due in July & i've never had to borrowed before in my life. I was watching television after praying & if this website is true, I will be forever grateful & return this favor to those who need help in the future
lender.occupational_info: I'm a single mother who's worked hard & saved up over the past few years so that I can pursue a low risk dream of mine that will not only provide for my family, but create a few jobs some people that have helped me out in the form of labor & encouragement since day 1 when everyone told me that it wouldn't be possible. I am in the process of opening a restaurant in a high traffic Shopping Mall. I have done extensive research & will be taking over a former McDonald's location. In this shopping mall there are mostly Asian foods, pizza, & Chick Fila. I will serve, Burgers, Wings, Hot Dogs, & Ribs. I have gotten really good food back & the 2,000+ mall employees & shoppers anticipate my opening date. I have taken care of most of the start up cost, however fell short of funding needed to purchase a 2 door Commercial Freezer, 2 door Commercial Fridge, 3 Commercial Fryers, & for the neon commercial sign design fee & installation

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: Forecasting the weather in New Zealand

lender.name: Ana Marie

lender.occupational_info: I am a "consultant" who represents products, services and people. By people, I mean ... hosts/emcees, trainers, facilitators and resource speakers. I intend to be the PREFERRED Consultancy firm which has a "pool" of industry experts for projects, events, training, seminars, conventions and conferences. I believe that the Philippines ALREADY has GREAT speakers ... I would want to SHOWCASE the talent we have in our own country to our fellow Filipinos! ;) I would want these people to share their knowledge, insights and experiences in their designated fields of expertise ... to mold, empower and inspire the YOUTH, th unemployed and those who have yet to DREAM, BELIEVE, DARE, DO! ;)

lender.name: Anika
lender.occupation: mother and assistant to my artist husband
lender.loan_because: we gotta share what we got. i don't know why privileges get distributed the way that they do in this world. but i know i am lucky enough to be in a situation where i don't have to worry about food and shelter right now so i would like to offer the same sense of security to fellow brothers and sisters. i'm not in the position where i can just jump in a plane or bus and go and physically help out, but i got some spare cash so i choose to help in that way.
lender.occupational_info: interesting, challenging, tiring, rewarding, frustrating, ever-changing.

lender.name: Dajenya
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can
lender.occupational_info: I do many things. I write poetry. I do (social) work helping people with problems. I raise children. I work to make more peace & freedom in the world for everyone. I love my female partner/spouse. I don't eat animals. I love my sons. I work to make the world a better place where everyone has what they need and no one is violent to any one. I work to end war, violence, racism, sexism, all kinds of discrimination (including homophobia). I am a pro-Palestinian Jew. I am an African-American/Jewish bisexual. I wish you food & good health & love & happiness who ever you are. Peace--

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I have a deep love and respect for the people of Costa Rica and want to be involved in helping small farmers.
lender.occupational_info: When I awake I don't need to know what day it is because I am headed out to the orchards. In the winter it is pruning, in spring it is soil analysis and leaf tissue analysis, in summer it is preparing the orchard floor for harvest, and in fall is harvest. A bit of over-simplification I admit but as farmers in Costa Rica know, there is always something that needs to be done. And I have not had to put it into words before.

lender.name: StarFactree
lender.loan_because: StarFactree Foundation, Inc. supports the arts and education to promote unity and diversity through community based creative innovation and initiatives.
lender.occupational_info: Just for Kids Las Vegas is a series of summer workshops for young people in multiple locations, teaching them to connect and work together, in person and remotely, with audio/visual and Internet technologies. Teens in each city are taught teamwork skills, as well as social and technological skills in performances and audio/visual workshops facilitated by technologists and theater artists. They subsequently create a performance that occurs both live in theaters and online simultaneously.Starfactree Foundation facilitates supervised collaboration, learning and creating. In the pilot program, we will be working with young people ages 13-16. In a series of progressive workshops, they will learn technical skills such as video/audio production, networked collaboration, digital storytelling, and streaming Internet media, while also developing social skills, creativity and communication skills through group work in improvisational theater, music and dance.

lender.occupational_info: I am the current Director of an online information Ministry. We are just starting. We will report christian activities and provide resources to communites. This new venture will allow us to empower thousands of Christian Businesses across America to become more financially independent, showing that every loan - even $25 - can make a real difference and change a life. JOIN US in powering Christian Businesses - one Business at a time! God Bless and Take Care!

lender.name: Patty
lender.occupational_info:
In December 2008, I founded a non-profit after experience a major increase in suicide among many teenagers and young children within my community. Resources are limited for children and families.
Insight & Beyond is a non-profit organization committed to providing a variety of mental health, addiction and suicide prevention, education and counseling services to individuals, children and families. We strive to assist in preserving and restoring families, promote the well-being and self sufficiency of individuals and build upon the strength and integrity of families and communities.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I feel the need to help others.

lender.name: tom
lender.occupational_info: I am an IT expert but self employed never employed , based in arusha tanzania , I specialise in repairing laptops , selling used laptops and used computers and also sell educational products to schools , i would be interested to link up with other like minded entreprenuers to sell IT products at affordable cost to schools , colleges , individuals and small time business people at a price they can afford.

lender.name: Denise
lender.occupational_info:
The idea of Reel Girls Fish! started when I got sick and tired of not being able to find apparel for women when preparing for bass tournaments. It got to the point where I was just fed up with shopping in the men's department, having to buy men's shirts that didn't fit right and caps that I didn't like (I prefer fishing visors). After asking tournament directors over and over again for a visor for the women fisherman and looking for shirts that actually fit, I decided to create the things that I would want to wear myself - both on the water and off.
Times have changed - we live in a new era. There are more than 13.6 million female anglers in the United States - that is more than 33% of all anglers! In addition, women anglers spend over $3 billion annually on trip-related fishing expenses and fishing equipment according to the National Survey of Fishing, Hunting and Wildlife-Associated Recreation. Today's women angler is as serious about her fishing as she is her sense of style. The fit is very important to women anglers - shirts that are actually made to fit a women's body, visors that women can wear and other accessories that are more custom made to enhance a woman's physique were something that I had always looked for but could never find.
Reel Girls Fish! will put an end to all the searching. I have shirts that actually fit, not those that have huge pockets around areas that don't need to have pockets! LOL!! In addition, I have visors for women, decals for the women anglers and so much more.

lender.name: Cynthia McGirt
lender.loan_because: I like helping someone who is in need of help for a positive cause.
lender.occupational_info:
"Making the difference in the lives of two"
I am the founder New Beginnings, an adolscent pregnant teen group home. I help pregnant teens ranging from 13-18 care for their own child with a primary focus on continuing education. My goal for these girls is to equip them with the education they need and proper parenting skills to help them become self-sufficient. One of the goals while being at New beginnings is to focus on second time prevention! We want to reduce these young mothers risk of being on welfare and having mutiple children. New beginnings offers over 15 service to help these mothers gain skills and training to one day live independently.

lender.name: Dewey
lender.loan_because: I can help people improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: I design roadways

lender.name: Caryn
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate. It feels good to see others succeed. I am not alone in the world. We are all connected. I benefit from your engagement and endeavor. Helping others helps me.
lender.occupational_info: My colleagues and I develop teaching resources and programming for K-12 history, literature, and humanities teachers and students. Our websites are free and seminars are inexpensive.

lender.name: Nancy- HeartMommy
lender.loan_because: By being of service to others through my work, will allow me to provide assistance to birth-mothers as they transition through the adoption process.
lender.occupational_info: After adopting my son in 2002, I became a strong advocate for the post placement support of birth mothers who have given their child up for adoption. My goal is to use my HeartMommy business to help create and sustain a foundation to assist birthmothers after placement with resources, support and guidance to continue in a positive path in their lives.

Our mission is to share smiles and bring laughter to enrich the lives of children who have had to overcome some challenges in their life. We also encourage them, give them hope and allow them to create their own beautiful dreams. lender.occupational_info: Im trying to be a student a Berklee College of Music but i also do graphic design and im a musician.

lender.loan_because: I need the funds to increase my business traffic, to advertise in the newspaper and elsewhere to reach clients and the people who need the help I provide. I started to advertise via passing out flyers, and the internet. the funds will be used also to provide the materials i need to educate the people who need help, as well as pay for any licenses i will need, flyers and business cards, brochures, paying for the venue. I have no where else to get the help i need to expand and keep my business running.
lender.occupational_info: I am a small business owner, i specialize in recruiting for small businesses who cannot afford to hire executive recuriters to assist them in their hiring search. I also hold seminars for students, minority , or anyone who cannot afford to attend a seminar on how to better improve and market themselves to employers, all this information i make affordable, there are so many people who cannot afford to attend these expensive seminars, i have experienced this myself and that is the reason why i decided to do this to help people and connect small business with qualified people who are not given a chance but have the skill and experience as well as discipline.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: Interested in helping a foreign small business. In my opinion, most charities are a waste of money, as the money rarely has any long-term benefits. A loan will help establish growth and self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: I use different tools to view what is beneath the ground surface for environmental or geotechnical applications.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because:
I have experienced and observed the need for supporting and encouraging those people whose dreams and abilities exceed their immediate resources. Kiva provides an alternative and perhaps only source of financial aid to many borrowers. Here are two quotes that I have used to guide many of my personal actions. I hope they will inspire those of you who read them.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. Eleanor Roosevelt
... the wisdom of choice: To try and fail is at least to learn; to fail to try is to suffer the inestimable loss of what might have been. Chester Irving Barnard
lender.occupational_info: I have been self employed for most of my life. I have engaged in many activities, beginning at age 11 by owning my own livestock and paying nearly all of my way though college. I have worked in the chemical industry, ironworking, home building, real estate and other businesses.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: we are a world community and each person and job is important. If I can help a little bit as a small business owner to another small business owner, it only makes us stronger.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: not everyone's as privileged as me.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teenage Internet Entrepreneur, Web Designer, Blogger and Student.

lender.occupational_info: We manufacture Fishing Lures that obtained a US Patent in March 2009 and want to expand into the nationwide market with Academy Sporting Goods and Maurice Distributors out of Chicago, Ill

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I believe that your life is measured by the joy you have brought to others.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I'm getting financial help to achieve my dreams. It seems only fair to give some back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a strategist.... an ideas person who works closely with others in creating new products and services on the Internet.

lender.name: Gary
lender.occupational_info: My small business provide janitorial service. my business suffered tremendously form the ongoing recession. I was forced to sell items to meet my expenses. I need financing to purchase equipment and repay debts that I was unable to pay because of lost of income.

lender.name: gosia
lender.loan_because:
"Few will have the greatness to bend history; but each of us can work to change a small portion of events, and in the total of all those acts will be written the history of this generation
It is from numberless diverse acts of courage and belief that human history is thus shaped. Each time a man stands up for an ideal, or acts to improve the lot of others, or strikes out against injustice, he sends forth a tiny ripple of hope, and crossing each other from a million different centers of energy and daring, those ripples build a current which can sweep down the mightiest walls of oppression and resistance." lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I need a loan. I am new to this Kiva experience. I am a disabled veteran, who has to work because I do not earn enough to pay my bills. I was given a blessed opportunity to become an Independant Distributor for Ardyss International. We offer products that are all natural, for cleansing and healing purposes. Our top requested item is our Body Magic... It practically sells itself. made of healing properties, It realigns your back/spine, and places your organs back in rhythm. Our products are for men and women.
lender.occupational_info: Our products are healing people of Cardiovasclar, Circulatory, Pulminary, and Terminal Diseases. They therefore improve the quality of life of every person that uses our products. I would like to have a product inventory on hand to have at demostration events.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I have two children and there was a time we used to sleep hungry especially towards the end of the month. I have deceided to start up my own travel tours business since i have all that it takes. My problem comes with funds because I cant even be allowed to get a bank loan and I am under permanent terms at my work place. being a single parent, it becomes so difficult and I want to stand up and take care of my children and be a better person in the society from my own sweat. i come here to loan because i want to help others and help myself also because i know what it means to be down there and you want to make ends meet but no funds are available.
lender.occupational_info: l work as a travel and tours agent. my job involves issuing tickets, tour arrangements and also travel planning.

lender.name: CHERIF
lender.occupational_info: I have an African grocery store in maple heights oh i am looking for loan to serve a larger variety of customer but most important to present african food to Americans beaucause Africa is always view as negatif.

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: I sell used quality auto parts all around the world. I have over 55% sales growth consistantly from month to month. A 10,000 loan would help my empire expand rapidly.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It's been a blessing to be on the receiving end when I had a need.
lender.occupational_info: I would describe my self as very creative, driven, determined and helpful. When I encourage others it ministers to my soul.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me and I have to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I was in show business for many years and now have retired and am investing in properties in Mexico to sell to poor people

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: Once a person has someone that believes in them, supports them, encourages them, then that person can thrive and grow. What is the most important thing in life? The answer is life itself. If someone has the opportunity to help another person then they should do so, no matter how small that help is. You help one person then you are helping the world be a better place.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: This my dream to make this a succeful buisness too support my family. I am struggling to get the supplies i truly need to advance to small buisness cleaning. I need to raise $10,000 to get floor buffers and vaccums as well as other eqquipment to get too the point of were cleaning actuall small buisnesses and homes is not a struggle and almost breaking even.
lender.occupational_info: I go in and clean homes from top to bottom! No job to big or small
